headline.main: Cholesterol: Debate Flares Over Wisdom In Widespread Reductions

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AS evidence continues to mount that high levels of cholesterol in the blood can increase the risk of heart attacks, a new debate is emerging over whether the average American should try to reduce cholesterol levels that have traditionally been considered ''normal.''
